segments.text: Oh no, look at that poor kitchen, it's turning into a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes so obliviously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool looks like he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is just waiting, so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would turn around and see this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies will be all soggy if they drop them now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how these little mishaps happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, poor things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this silly scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
